messages.message:
has anyone run into babel-cli errors when building webapp? Any idea how to fix this?
```
Error: ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '../build/py/static/js/apps/flow-studio/flow-studio.js'
    at Object.openSync (fs.js:449:3)
    at Object.writeFileSync (fs.js:1211:35)
    at output (/Users/heymian/src/instabase/webserver/shared/node/node_modules/babel-cli/lib/babel/file.js:90:10)
    at walk (/Users/heymian/src/instabase/webserver/shared/node/node_modules/babel-cli/lib/babel/file.js:150:5)
    at files (/Users/heymian/src/instabase/webserver/shared/node/node_modules/babel-cli/lib/babel/file.js:156:7)
    at module.exports (/Users/heymian/src/instabase/webserver/shared/node/node_modules/babel-cli/lib/babel/file.js:184:5)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/heymian/src/instabase/webserver/shared/node/node_modules/babel-cli/lib/babel/index.js:129:1)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:736:30)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:747:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:628:32)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "compile_js.py", line 115, in <module>
    main()
  File "compile_js.py", line 94, in main
    _handle_js_dir(input_dir, current_dir)
  File "compile_js.py", line 75, in _handle_js_dir
    _copy_or_run_babel(src_path, relative_path)
  File "compile_js.py", line 54, in _copy_or_run_babel
    _copy_js_directly(src_path, relative_path)
  File "compile_js.py", line 25, in _copy_js_directly
    shutil.copy2(src_path, out_path)
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@2/2.7.15_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/shutil.py", line 144, in copy2
    copyfile(src, dst)
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@2/2.7.15_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/shutil.py", line 97, in copyfile
    with open(dst, 'wb') as fdst:
IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: u'../build/py/static/js/apps/webpacked/tableRefiner.bundle.js'
make[1]: *** [compile-js] Error 1
make: *** [compile-static-files] Error 2
```
never mind, semi-fixed. did a bunch of make clean builds in a lot of directories and it went away.
Huh weird. I didn’t think Babel-cli is even a dependency of ours right now because I’m about to add it in a PR I have open...
